```{r}
#install.packages('tidyverse')
#install.packages('DataExplorer')
```
```{r Library}
library(corrplot)
library(ggplot2)
library(DataExplorer)
```
```{r read date}
date <- read.csv("glass.csv", header = TRUE)
```
```{r view date}
View(date)
date
```
```{r show num column}
colnum <- ncol(date)
print(paste("num of col : ", ncol(date)))

```
```{r show number row}
rownum <- nrow(date)
print(paste("num of row : ", nrow(date)))
```
```{r show name column}
print(colnames(date))
```
```{r show struachre date }
str(date)
```
```{r show summary date}
summary(date)
```
```{r show plot missing date beffor replace value}
plot_missing(date)
```
```{r replace 0 value to null value and show}
date[date==0]<- NA
plot_missing(date, geom_label_args = list("size" = 4),title = "Missing Data in Glass",theme_config = list(legend.position =c("top")))
```
```{r}
date<-date[,-8:-9]
date[is.na(date)]<- 0
date
```
```{r}
plot_missing(date)
```
```{r}
table(date$Type)
```
```{r}
date$Type <-as.factor(date$Type)
str(date)
```
```{r}
boxplot(date[,-8])
```
```{r}
corleation<-cor(date[,-8])
corrplot(corleation)
```
